org.springframework.aop

接口 AfterAdvice

  • 所有超级接口:
    org.aopalliance.aop.Advice

    public interface AfterAdvice
extends org.aopalliance.aop.Advice
    Common marker interface for after advice, such as AfterReturningAdvice and ThrowsAdvice.
